Class MatrixService

java.lang.Object
model.MatrixService
public class MatrixService extends Object
Class responsible for handling all mathematical operations on the Matrix object
Version:
2.0
Author:
Bartek

      private Matrix createSubMatrix(Matrix origin, int step)
      Helper methode used to create a minor matrix for the element designated by the step argument
      Parameters:
      origin - original matrix to be split
      step - column with the element to create minor matrix for
      Returns:
      Matrix object containing the minor

      Returns:

    • compareMatrix

      public boolean compareMatrix(Matrix mat, Double[][] tab)
      Methode used to compare the matrix to a two-dimensional array Class designed for Tests and should only be used there Should only be used with correct values - the same matrix size
      Parameters:
      tab - value to compare to
      Returns:
      true if both arrays has the same elements in the same positions
